fields.name: 1966 Fender Telecaster, Sonic Blue
fields.description: Beautiful example of a player's grade vintage Telecaster. Rosewood fingerboard which has been refretted and is ready to play. Wear on neck is 100% natural. Professional refinish and relic job to match by Cardiff luthier Dave Dearnaley. Supplied with original hard case.

fields.name: C. 1955 Gibson LG1
fields.description: Rare Gibson example of this kind. Brought to the UK about seven years ago from a music store in White Rock, BC, Canada. A very well-worn, played and loved guitar. In good playing condition, sounding great but could be fully restored if desired.

fields.name: Fender Squier JV Stratocaster (1982-84), Sunburst
fields.description: Prime example of a player's grade JV Strat. All original with exception of the bridge and rear guard. Maple fingerboard. Plenty of life left in the frets.

fields.name: 1989 Takamine EN-10
fields.description: A lovely well-gigged acoustic dreadnought-shaped guitar with built-in pickup - a favorite amoungst sound engineers. Solid condtion all-around. Natural signs of age and us are all cosmetic.

fields.name: 1960s Gibson Discovered Tremolo Guitar Amp
fields.description: All original vintage Gibson Valve Amplifier. Fiteed with modern 1 x 12 Eminence Speaker. Sounds clean as can be with fully functional vibrato.
